turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Starbucks drink to pickup on my way home. I'm about to get off work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it from the Starbucks on Floyd Street by your apartment?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want to be able to get it in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I have the site pulled up. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have an iced caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Regular milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I would like soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Whipped cream or no?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want an extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be nice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size? They have talle, grande, venti, and trenta.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, the order has been put in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $5.88 and its been put on your card. They'll text you a receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, your grande iced caramel macchiato with soy will be ready for pickup in the next fifteen minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Enjoy the coffee!
